67:1.text: تَبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى بِيَدِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُلۡكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١

67:2.text: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ لِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُوَكُمۡ أَيُّكُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ٢

67:3.text: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَ سَمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='ikhafa'>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>ِبَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تَرَىٰ فِى خَلۡقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>وُ<rule class=ikhafa>تٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡجِعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَصَرَ هَلۡ تَرَىٰ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ُط<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٍ ٣

67:4.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡجِعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيۡنِ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَصَرُ خَاسِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ئًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ حَس<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٤

67:5.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> زَيَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا بِمَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِيحَ وَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا رُجُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلشَّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِينِ‌ۖ وَأَعۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا لَهُمۡ عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ٥

67:6.text: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِرَبِّهِمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ‌ۖ وَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٦

67:7.text: إِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُلۡقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهَا سَمِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهَا شَهِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهِىَ تَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ٧

67:8.text: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡظِ‌ۖ كُلَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُلۡقِىَ فِيهَا فَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>جٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َأَلَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ نَذ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٨

67:9.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَلَىٰ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا نَذِي<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َكَذَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا وَقُلۡنَا مَا نَزَّلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َىۡءٍ إِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ٩

67:10.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡ كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَسۡمَعُ أَوۡ نَعۡقِلُ مَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ١٠

67:11.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡتَرَفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِذَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِهِمۡ فَسُحۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّأَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ١١

67:12.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّغۡفِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١٢

67:13.text: وَأَسِرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡلَكُمۡ أَوِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِذَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ١٣

67:14.text: أَلَا يَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>لَّطِيفُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ١٤

67:15.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ ذَلُول<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡشُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ِّزۡقِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُش<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ١٥

67:16.text: ءَأَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡسِفَ بِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ١٦

67:17.text: أَمۡ أَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حَاصِ<rule class=ikhafa>بًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َسَتَعۡلَمُونَ كَيۡفَ نَذ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ١٧

67:18.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَذَّبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ١٨

67:19.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيۡرِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_necessary>ـٰٓ</rule>فَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بِضۡنَ‌ۚ مَا يُمۡسِكُهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِكُلِّ شَىۡ<rule class=iqlab>ءِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١٩

67:20.text: أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى هُوَ جُن<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ‌ۚ إِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرُونَ إِلَّا فِى غُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٍ ٢٠

67:21.text: أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يَرۡزُقُكُمۡ إِنۡ أَمۡسَكَ رِزۡقَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ بَل لَّجُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى عُتُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>وٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنُف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٍ ٢١

67:22.text: أَفَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َمۡشِى مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَهۡدَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َمۡشِى سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٢٢

67:23.text: قُلۡ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>َأَكُمۡ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمۡعَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَفۡــِٔدَةَ‌ۖ قَلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣

67:24.text: قُلۡ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٤

67:25.text: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَعۡدُ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٥

67:26.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمُ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ نَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٢٦

67:27.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَأَوۡهُ زُلۡفَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ِ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>يٓ</rule>ــَٔتۡ وُجُوهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَقِيلَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> تَدَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٧

67:28.text: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَهۡلَكَنِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعِىَ أَوۡ رَحِمَنَا فَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُجِيرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ مِنۡ عَذَابٍ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٢٨

67:29.text: قُلۡ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَعَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡنَا‌ۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ هُوَ فِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٢٩

67:30.text: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَصۡبَحَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُكُمۡ غَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِيك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِۭ ٣٠

68:1.text: <rule class=madda_necessary>نٓ</rule>‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَلَمِ وَمَا يَسۡطُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١

68:2.text: م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ بِنِعۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ بِمَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٍ ٢

68:3.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَكَ لَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا غَيۡرَ مَمۡن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٍ ٣

68:4.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَعَلَىٰ خُلُقٍ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٤

68:7.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>َلَّ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧

68:9.text: وَدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡ تُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>هِنُ فَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>هِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩

68:10.text: وَلَا تُطِعۡ كُلَّ حَلَّا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ١٠

68:11.text: هَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>زٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّشّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=iqlab>ءِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِنَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١١

68:12.text: مَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>عٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡخَيۡرِ مُعۡتَدٍ أَث<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٢

68:13.text: عُتُل<rule class=iqlab>ِّۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ زَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٣

68:14.text: أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ ذَا مَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤

68:15.text: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُنَا قَالَ أَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِيرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٥

68:17.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بَلَوۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ كَمَا بَلَوۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ إِذۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَيَصۡرِمُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا مُصۡبِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٧

68:19.text: فَطَافَ عَلَيۡهَا ط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

68:22.text: أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٢

68:23.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>َلَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَهُمۡ يَتَخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فَت<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣

68:24.text: أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّسۡك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٢٤

68:25.text: وَغَدَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ حَرۡ<rule class=ikhafa>دٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٥

68:26.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَأَوۡهَا قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَض<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓلّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٦

68:28.text: قَالَ أَوۡسَطُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ لَوۡلَا تُسَبِّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٨

68:29.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ رَبِّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٩

68:30.text: فَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَلَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>وَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٠

68:31.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>وَيۡلَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا طَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣١

68:32.text: عَسَىٰ رَبُّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِلَنَا خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>غِب<rule class='madda_permissible'>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٢

68:33.text: كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابُ‌ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُ‌ۚ لَوۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٣

68:34.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّهِمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٣٤

68:35.text: أَفَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡلِمِينَ كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٥

68:37.text: أَمۡ لَكُمۡ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِيهِ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رُس<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٧

68:38.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَكُمۡ فِيهِ لَمَا تَخَيَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٨

68:39.text: أَمۡ لَكُمۡ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نٌ عَلَيۡنَا بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِغَةٌ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۙ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَكُمۡ لَمَا تَحۡكُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٩

68:40.text: سَلۡهُمۡ أَيُّه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ب</rule>ِذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ زَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٤٠

68:41.text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ فَلۡيَأۡتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِشُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤١

68:42.text: يَوۡمَ يُكۡشَفُ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عَوۡنَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢

68:43.text: خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شِعَةً أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عَوۡنَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سُّجُودِ وَهُمۡ سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٣

68:44.text: فَذَرۡنِى وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُكَذِّبُ بِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَدِيثِ‌ۖ سَنَسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِجُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٤

68:45.text: وَأُمۡلِى لَهُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كَيۡدِى مَت<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٤٥

68:46.text: أَمۡ تَسۡــَٔلُهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّغۡرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّثۡقَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٦

68:47.text: أَمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبُ فَهُمۡ يَكۡتُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٧

68:48.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َصَاحِبِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُوتِ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكۡظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مٌ ٤٨

68:49.text: لَّوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ت</rule>َد<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>رَكَهُ<rule class='madda_normal'>ۥ</rule> نِعۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَنُبِذَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَهُوَ مَذۡم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مٌ ٤٩

68:50.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ رَبُّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَجَعَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٠

68:51.text: وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكَادُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَيُزۡلِقُونَكَ بِأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِهِمۡ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا سَمِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَمَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٌ ٥١

68:52.text: وَمَا هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٢

69:3.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡح<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓقَّةُ ٣

69:4.text: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ وَعَا<rule class=iqlab>دُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَارِعَةِ ٤

69:5.text: فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ثَمُودُ فَأُهۡلِكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّاغِيَةِ ٥

69:6.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا عَا<rule class=ikhafa>دٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأُهۡلِكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِرِي<rule class=ikhafa>حٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َرۡصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٍ ٦

69:7.text: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَ لَيَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َثَمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُو<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َتَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ فِيهَا صَرۡعَىٰ كَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٍ خَاوِيَةٍ ٧

69:8.text: فَهَلۡ تَرَىٰ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َاقِيَةٍ ٨

69:9.text: وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡتَفِكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَاطِئَةِ ٩

69:10.text: فَعَصَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ أَخۡذَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّابِيَةً ١٠

69:11.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا طَغَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ حَمَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَارِيَةِ ١١

69:12.text: لِنَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلَهَا لَكُمۡ تَذۡكِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَعِيَه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُذُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>عِيَةٌ ١٢

69:13.text: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّورِ نَفۡخَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَةٌ ١٣

69:14.text: وَحُمِلَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَةً ١٤

69:16.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>َقَّتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ فَهِىَ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َاهِيَةٌ ١٦

69:17.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَكُ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَرۡج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهَا‌ۚ وَيَحۡمِلُ عَرۡشَ رَبِّكَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>َمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِيَةٌ ١٧

69:18.text: يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ خَافِيَةٌ ١٨

69:19.text: فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا مَنۡ أُوتِىَ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِيَمِينِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَيَقُولُ ه<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَءُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِيَهۡ ١٩

69:20.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى ظَنَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى مُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قٍ حِسَابِيَهۡ ٢٠

69:24.text: كُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡرَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَنِ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>يٓـ</rule>ـ<rule class=iqlab>ـَٔۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسۡلَفۡتُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَّامِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَالِيَةِ ٢٤

69:25.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا مَنۡ أُوتِىَ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِشِمَالِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَيَقُولُ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَيۡتَنِى لَمۡ أُوتَ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِيَهۡ ٢٥

69:32.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ فِى سِلۡسِلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َرۡعُهَا سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عُونَ ذِرَا<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡلُك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>هُ ٣٢

69:33.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٣٣

69:34.text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِسۡك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٣٤

69:35.text: فَلَيۡسَ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُنَا حَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٣٥

69:36.text: وَلَا طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنۡ غِسۡل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٣٦

69:37.text: لَّا يَأۡكُلُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِــٔ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٧

69:38.text: فَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سِمُ بِمَا تُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٨

69:40.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَقَوۡلُ رَسُو<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٤٠

69:41.text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَاعِ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤١

69:42.text: وَلَا بِقَوۡلِ كَاهِ<rule class=ikhafa>نٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢

69:43.text: تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٣

69:44.text: وَلَوۡ تَقَوَّلَ عَلَيۡنَا بَعۡضَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَقَاو<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لِ ٤٤

69:46.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَقَطَعۡنَا مِنۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَت<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٦

69:47.text: فَمَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَحَدٍ عَنۡهُ حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٧

69:48.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَتَذۡكِرَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٨

69:49.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَنَعۡلَمُ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّكَذِّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٩

69:50.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَحَسۡرَةٌ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٠

69:51.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَحَقُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٥١

69:52.text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡمِ رَبِّكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٥٢

70:1.text: سَأَلَ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=iqlab>لُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِعَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َاقِعٍ ١

70:2.text: لِّلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ لَيۡسَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> دَافِعٌ ٢

70:4.text: تَعۡرُجُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّوحُ إِلَيۡهِ فِى يَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ مِ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دَارُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> خَمۡسِينَ أَلۡفَ سَنَةٍ ٤

70:5.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ صَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َمِيلاً ٥

70:8.text: يَوۡمَ تَكُونُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهۡلِ ٨

70:11.text: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمۡ‌ۚ يَوَدُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِمُ لَوۡ يَفۡتَدِى مِنۡ عَذَابِ يَوۡمِئِ<rule class=iqlab>ذِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِبَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>هِ ١١

70:14.text: وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ جَمِي<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>هِ ١٤

70:17.text: تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بَرَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ ١٧

70:19.text: ۞إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا ١٩

70:23.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمۡ د<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣

70:24.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِهِمۡ حَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعۡل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مٌ ٢٤

70:26.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُصَدِّقُونَ بِيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٢٦

70:27.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّشۡفِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٧

70:28.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمۡ غَيۡرُ مَأۡم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٍ ٢٨

70:29.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هُمۡ لِفُرُوجِهِمۡ حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٩

70:30.text: إِلَّا عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جِهِمۡ أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُهُمۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ غَيۡرُ مَلُوم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٠

70:31.text: فَمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغَىٰ وَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَاد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣١

70:32.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هُمۡ لِأَمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِهِمۡ وَعَهۡدِهِمۡ ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ع<rule class='madda_permissible'>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٢

70:33.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ب</rule>ِشَهَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>د<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِهِمۡ ق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٣

70:34.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمۡ يُحَافِظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٤

70:35.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ فِى جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّكۡرَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

70:36.text: فَمَالِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قِبَلَكَ مُهۡطِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٦

70:37.text: عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شِّمَالِ عِز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٧

70:38.text: أَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مَعُ كُلُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرِى<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ٍٕ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خَلَ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ نَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٣٨

70:39.text: كَلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٩

70:40.text: فَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سِمُ بِرَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَشَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِقِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِبِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٠

70:41.text: عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّبَدِّلَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤١

70:42.text: فَذَرۡهُمۡ يَخُوضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَيَلۡعَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَتَّىٰ يُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَوۡمَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُوعَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢

70:43.text: يَوۡمَ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>دَاثِ سِرَا<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ إِلَىٰ نُصُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُوفِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٣

70:44.text: خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شِعَةً أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُوعَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٤

71:1.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرۡ قَوۡمَكَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِيَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١

71:2.text: قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لَكُمۡ نَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٢

71:3.text: أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٣

71:4.text: يَغۡفِرۡ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُؤَخِّرۡكُمۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ًى‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَجَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ‌ۖ لَوۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤

71:5.text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِى لَيۡل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَهَارًا ٥

71:6.text: فَلَمۡ يَزِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>هُمۡ دُع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓء<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَّا فِرَارًا ٦

71:7.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى كُلَّمَا دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ لِتَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ جَعَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِعَهُمۡ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡشَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ثِيَابَهُمۡ وَأَصَرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتِكۡبَارًا ٧

71:8.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ جِهَارًا ٨

71:9.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡلَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارًا ٩

71:10.text: فَقُلۡتُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ غَفَّارًا ١٠

71:11.text: يُرۡسِلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ عَلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَارًا ١١

71:12.text: وَيُمۡدِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ب</rule>ِأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبَنِينَ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لَّكُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لَّكُمۡ أَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رًا ١٢

71:13.text: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا ١٣

71:15.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡفَ خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَ سَمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='ikhafa'>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>ِبَاقًا ١٥

71:16.text: وَجَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرَ فِيهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسَ سِرَاجًا ١٦

71:17.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>َتَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ نَبَاتًا ١٧

71:18.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُعِيدُكُمۡ فِيهَا وَيُخۡرِجُكُمۡ إِخۡرَاجًا ١٨

71:19.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بِسَاطًا ١٩

71:20.text: لِّتَسۡلُكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهَا سُبُل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِجَاجًا ٢٠

71:21.text: قَالَ نُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>حٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِى وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَزِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>هُ مَالُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَوَلَدُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا خَسَارًا ٢١

71:23.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَذَرُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَذَرُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَد<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا سُوَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسۡرًا ٢٣

71:24.text: وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَضَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تَزِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لاً ٢٤

71:25.text: مِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا خَط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ِيٓ</rule>ـَٔ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِهِمۡ أُغۡرِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَأُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نَا<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَمۡ يَجِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َارًا ٢٥

71:26.text: وَقَالَ نُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>حٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ دَيَّارًا ٢٦

71:27.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َذَرۡهُمۡ يُضِلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَّا فَاجِ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َفَّارًا ٢٧

71:28.text: رَّبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡفِرۡ لِى وَلِو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِدَىَّ وَلِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>َخَلَ بَيۡتِىَ مُؤۡمِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَلَا تَزِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارَۢا ٢٨

72:1.text: قُلۡ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَمَعَ نَفَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ فَقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا سَمِعۡنَا قُرۡءَانًا عَجَبًا ١

72:2.text: يَهۡد<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّشۡدِ فَـَٔـامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّشۡرِكَ بِرَبِّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَحَدًا ٢

72:3.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> تَعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا وَلَدًا ٣

72:4.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ شَطَطًا ٤

72:5.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا ظَنَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َقُولَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَذِبًا ٥

72:6.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ رِجَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ فَزَادُوهُمۡ رَهَقًا ٦

72:7.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ ظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَمَا ظَنَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَحَدًا ٧

72:8.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَمَسۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ فَوَجَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا مُلِئَتۡ حَرَ<rule class=ikhafa>سًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َشُهُبًا ٨

72:9.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>عُدُ مِنۡهَا مَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِدَ لِلسَّمۡعِ‌ۖ فَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡتَمِعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنَ يَجِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> شِهَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّصَدًا ٩

72:10.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَا نَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ر<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ أَرَادَ بِهِمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ رَشَدًا ١٠

72:11.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحُونَ وَمِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا دُونَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ‌ۖ كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا طَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِقَ قِدَدًا ١١

72:12.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا ظَنَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّعۡجِزَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّعۡجِزَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هَرَبًا ١٢

72:13.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا سَمِعۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ فَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡم<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِرَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا رَهَقًا ١٣

72:14.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡلِمُونَ وَمِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِطُونَ‌ۖ فَمَنۡ أَسۡلَمَ فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ تَحَرَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَشَدًا ١٤

72:15.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِطُونَ فَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِجَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ حَطَبًا ١٥

72:16.text: وَأَلَّوِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسۡقَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءً غَدَقًا ١٦

72:17.text: لِّنَفۡتِنَهُمۡ فِيهِ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُعۡرِضۡ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِكۡرِ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَسۡلُكۡهُ عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َعَدًا ١٧

72:18.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَحَدًا ١٨

72:19.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا قَامَ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوهُ كَادُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكُونُونَ عَلَيۡهِ لِبَدًا ١٩

72:20.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبِّى وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُشۡرِكُ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَحَدًا ٢٠

72:21.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَر<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا رَشَدًا ٢١

72:22.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُجِيرَنِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَنۡ أَجِدَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مُلۡتَحَدًا ٢٢

72:23.text: إِلَّا بَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>غًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرِسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡصِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> نَارَ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَبَدًا ٢٣

72:24.text: حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا رَأَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَضۡعَفُ نَاصِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا ٢٤

72:25.text: قُلۡ إِنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ر<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَقَرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمۡ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> رَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَمَدًا ٢٥

72:26.text: عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ فَلَا يُظۡهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيۡبِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَحَدًا ٢٦

72:27.text: إِلَّا مَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡتَضَىٰ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّسُو<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَسۡلُكُ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> رَصَدًا ٢٧

72:28.text: لِّيَعۡلَمَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَغُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رِسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ وَأَحۡصَىٰ كُلَّ شَىۡءٍ عَدَدَۢا ٢٨

73:3.text: نِّصۡفَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَوِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>ُصۡ مِنۡهُ قَلِيلاً ٣

73:4.text: أَوۡ زِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلاً ٤

73:5.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا سَنُلۡقِى عَلَيۡكَ قَوۡل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>َقِيلاً ٥

73:6.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ نَاشِئَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ هِىَ أَشَدُّ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>ـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>وَمُ قِيلاً ٦

73:7.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَكَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َوِيلاً ٧

73:8.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِيلاً ٨

73:9.text: رَّبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَشۡرِقِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَغۡرِبِ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخِذۡهُ وَكِيلاً ٩

73:10.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡجُرۡهُمۡ هَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َمِيلاً ١٠

73:11.text: وَذَرۡنِى وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُكَذِّبِينَ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َعۡمَةِ وَمَهِّلۡهُمۡ قَلِيلاً ١١

73:12.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَدَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َال<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَحِيمًا ١٢

73:13.text: وَطَعَا<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َا غُصَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا ١٣

73:14.text: يَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالُ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّهِيلاً ١٤

73:15.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكُمۡ رَسُول<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِدًا عَلَيۡكُمۡ كَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ رَسُولاً ١٥

73:16.text: فَعَصَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولَ فَأَخَذۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ أَخۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبِيلاً ١٦

73:17.text: فَكَيۡفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َفَرۡتُمۡ يَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡوِلۡد<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نَ شِيبًا ١٧

73:18.text: ٱ<rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َطِ<rule class=iqlab>رُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَفۡعُولاً ١٨

73:19.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> تَذۡكِرَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> سَبِيلاً ١٩

73:20.text: ۞إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ يَعۡلَمُ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ تَقُومُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَىٰ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُلُثَىِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَنِصۡفَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَثُلُثَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِفَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مَعَكَ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ‌ۚ عَلِمَ أ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّرۡضَىٰ‌ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يَضۡرِبُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يُقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَءُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنۡهُ‌ۚ وَأَقِيمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَءَاتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رِضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا تُقَدِّمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ خَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َجِدُوهُ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ هُوَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَعۡظَمَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُۢ ٢٠

74:5.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡجُرۡ ٥

74:8.text: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ٨

74:9.text: فَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َوۡمٌ عَس<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٩

74:10.text: عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ غَيۡرُ يَس<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ١٠

74:12.text: وَجَعَلۡتُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَال<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّمۡدُودًا ١٢

74:16.text: كَلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ لِأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا عَنِيدًا ١٦

74:23.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بَرَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرَ ٢٣

74:24.text: فَقَالَ إِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا سِحۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡثَرُ ٢٤

74:48.text: فَمَا تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُهُمۡ شَفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٨
