75:39.text: فَجَعَلَ مِنۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّوۡجَيۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذَّكَرَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُ<rule class=ikhafa>نث</rule>َىٰٓ ٣٩

75:40.text: أَلَيۡسَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِرٍ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُحۡــِۧىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَىٰ ٤٠

76:1.text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ حِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّهۡرِ لَمۡ يَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّذۡكُورًا ١

76:2.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>فَةٍ أَمۡشَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَلِيهِ فَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ سَمِيع<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َصِيرًا ٢

76:3.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا هَدَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّبِيلَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا شَاكِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَفُورًا ٣

76:4.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا لِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِلَ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَأَغۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسَعِيرًا ٤

76:5.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َأۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا ٥

76:6.text: عَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِيرًا ٦

76:7.text: يُوفُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َذۡرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ شَرُّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُسۡتَطِيرًا ٧

76:8.text: وَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>عِمُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِسۡكِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَتِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَسِيرًا ٨

76:9.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا نُ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>عِمُكُمۡ لِوَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا شُكُورًا ٩

76:10.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَخَافُ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُو<rule class=ikhafa>سًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َمۡطَرِيرًا ١٠

76:11.text: فَوَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ شَرَّ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ وَلَقَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ نَضۡرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسُرُورًا ١١

76:12.text: وَجَزَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا صَبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َحَرِيرًا ١٢

76:13.text: مُّتَّكِــِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِكِ‌ۖ لَا يَرَوۡنَ فِيهَا شَمۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا زَمۡهَرِيرًا ١٣

76:14.text: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيۡهِمۡ ظِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُهَا وَذُلِّلَتۡ قُطُوفُهَا تَذۡلِيلاً ١٤

76:15.text: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِـَٔـانِيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِضَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَكۡوَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَتۡ قَوَارِيرَاۡ ١٥

76:16.text: قَوَارِيرَ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِضَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َدَّرُوهَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِيرًا ١٦

76:17.text: وَيُسۡقَوۡنَ فِيهَا كَأۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َبِيلاً ١٧

76:18.text: عَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِيهَا تُسَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َىٰ سَلۡسَبِيلاً ١٨

76:19.text: ۞وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وِلۡد<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ حَسِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَهُمۡ لُؤۡلُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ؤًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّ<rule class=ikhafa>نث</rule>ُورًا ١٩

76:20.text: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ ثَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ رَأَيۡتَ نَعِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمُلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>كًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َبِيرًا ٢٠

76:21.text: عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِيَهُمۡ ثِيَابُ سُ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ُسٍ خُضۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َحُلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَسَاوِرَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِضَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ شَرَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َهُورًا ٢١

76:22.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَانَ سَعۡيُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّشۡكُورًا ٢٢

76:23.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِيلاً ٢٣

76:24.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعۡ مِنۡهُمۡ ءَاثِمًا أَوۡ كَفُورًا ٢٤

76:25.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡمَ رَبِّكَ بُكۡرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَصِيلاً ٢٥

76:26.text: وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡجُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَسَبِّحۡهُ لَيۡل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َوِيلاً ٢٦

76:27.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ يُحِبُّونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ يَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>َقِيلاً ٢٧

76:28.text: نَّحۡنُ خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ وَشَدَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسۡرَهُمۡ‌ۖ وَإِذَا شِئۡنَا بَدَّلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِيلاً ٢٨

76:29.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> تَذۡكِرَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> سَبِيلاً ٢٩

76:30.text: وَمَا تَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُونَ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا ٣٠

76:31.text: يُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ فِى رَحۡمَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمَۢا ٣١

77:3.text: وَ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule><rule class='ghunnah'>نّ</rule>َ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>شِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ نَشۡرًا ٣

77:14.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ مَا يَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَصۡلِ ١٤

77:18.text: كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَفۡعَلُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨

77:20.text: أَلَمۡ نَخۡلُ<rule class=idgham_mutaqaribayn>ق</rule>كّ<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٢٠

77:21.text: فَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ فِى قَرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٢١

77:27.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا رَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>سِىَ شَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَسۡقَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ُرَاتًا ٢٧

77:29.text: ٱ<rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>َلِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> تُكَذِّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٩

77:30.text: ٱ<rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>َلِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ ظِ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِى ثَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثِ شُعَ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٣٠

77:31.text: لَّا ظَلِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يُغۡنِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>لَّهَ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٣١

77:32.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا تَرۡمِى بِشَرَ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَصۡرِ ٣٢

77:33.text: كَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> جِمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ<rule class=ikhafa>تٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>ُفۡرٌ ٣٣

77:35.text: هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا يَوۡمُ لَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>ِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

77:38.text: هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا يَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَصۡلِ‌ۖ جَمَعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٨

77:39.text: فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ لَكُمۡ كَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>دٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َكِيد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٣٩

77:41.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّقِينَ فِى ظِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعُي<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٍ ٤١

77:42.text: وَفَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>كِهَ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَشۡتَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢

77:43.text: كُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡرَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَنِ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>يٓـ</rule>ـ<rule class=iqlab>ـَٔۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٣

77:44.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٤

77:46.text: كُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتَمَتَّعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَلِيلاً إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٦

77:48.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡكَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا يَرۡكَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٨

77:50.text: فَبِأَىِّ حَدِي<rule class=iqlab>ثِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٠

78:2.text: عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبَإِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٢

78:6.text: أَلَمۡ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ مِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دًا ٦

78:12.text: وَبَنَيۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمۡ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>ِدَادًا ١٢

78:14.text: وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا مِنَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡمُعۡصِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>َجَّاجًا ١٤

78:15.text: لِّنُخۡرِجَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> حَب<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَبَاتًا ١٥

78:17.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَصۡلِ كَانَ مِيقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تًا ١٧

78:18.text: يَوۡمَ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َخُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجًا ١٨

78:19.text: وَفُتِحَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ فَكَانَتۡ أَ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>بًا ١٩

78:21.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ كَانَتۡ مِرۡصَادًا ٢١

78:24.text: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا شَرَابًا ٢٤

78:27.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا يَرۡجُونَ حِسَابًا ٢٧

78:29.text: وَكُلَّ شَىۡءٍ أَحۡصَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بًا ٢٩

78:30.text: فَذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّزِيدَكُمۡ إِلَّا عَذَابًا ٣٠

78:35.text: لَّا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>وًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا كِذّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>بًا ٣٥

78:36.text: جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ عَط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءً حِسَابًا ٣٦

78:37.text: رَّبِّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ‌ۖ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِنۡهُ خِطَابًا ٣٧

78:38.text: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّوحُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ صَف<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ًّا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا ٣٨

78:39.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ‌ۖ فَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَـَٔـابًا ٣٩

78:40.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>َرۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َوۡمَ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَرۡءُ مَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَافِرُ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَيۡتَنِى كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ تُر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>بَۢا ٤٠

79:1.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>زِعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ غَرۡقًا ١

79:2.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شِطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ نَشۡطًا ٢

79:3.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حًا ٣

79:4.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>قًا ٤

79:10.text: يَقُولُونَ أَءِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَمَرۡدُودُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَافِرَةِ ١٠

79:11.text: أَءِذَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عِظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّخِرَةً ١١

79:12.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تِلۡكَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ذًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ ١٢

79:13.text: فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا هِىَ زَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَةٌ ١٣

79:14.text: فَإِذَا ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاهِرَةِ ١٤

79:16.text: إِذۡ نَادَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ رَبُّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَادِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى ١٦

79:17.text: ٱذۡهَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> طَغَىٰ ١٧

79:18.text: فَقُلۡ هَل لَّكَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َزَكَّىٰ ١٨

79:25.text: فَأَخَذَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ نَكَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُولَىٰٓ ٢٥

79:26.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَعِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡشَىٰٓ ٢٦

79:27.text: ءَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ بَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا ٢٧

79:30.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ دَحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَآ ٣٠

79:33.text: مَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ وَلِأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِكُمۡ ٣٣

79:34.text: فَإِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طّ<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَىٰ ٣٤

79:35.text: يَوۡمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ مَا سَعَىٰ ٣٥

79:38.text: وَءَاثَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا ٣٨

79:40.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا مَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَنَهَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َفۡسَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهَوَىٰ ٤٠

79:41.text: فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ هِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَأۡوَىٰ ٤١

79:42.text: يَسۡــَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرۡسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا ٤٢

79:43.text: فِيمَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِكۡرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هَآ ٤٣

79:45.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡشَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا ٤٥

79:46.text: كَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَهَا لَمۡ يَلۡبَث<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوۡ ضُحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا ٤٦

80:3.text: وَمَا يُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِيكَ لَعَلَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَزَّكَّىٰٓ ٣

80:4.text: أَوۡ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرَىٰٓ ٤

80:8.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكَ يَسۡعَىٰ ٨

80:17.text: قُتِلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَكۡفَرَهُۥ ١٧

80:19.text: م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>فَةٍ خَلَقَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَقَدَّرَهُۥ ١٩

80:21.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَمَاتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَرَهُۥ ٢١

80:22.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِذَا ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>َرَهُۥ ٢٢

80:23.text: كَلَّا لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ضِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمَرَهُۥ ٢٣

80:24.text: فَلۡيَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦٓ ٢٤

80:25.text: أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا صَبَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ صَبًّا ٢٥

80:26.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ شَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ شَقًّا ٢٦

80:32.text: مَّتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ وَلِأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِكُمۡ ٣٢

80:34.text: يَوۡمَ يَفِرُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَرۡءُ مِنۡ أَخ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>هِ ٣٤

80:37.text: لِكُلِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرِى<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ٍٕ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َأۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُغۡن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>هِ ٣٧

81:2.text: وَإِذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُجُومُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َدَرَتۡ ٢

81:15.text: فَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سِمُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َسِ ١٥

81:18.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ ١٨

81:19.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَقَوۡلُ رَسُو<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٩

81:20.text: ذِى قُوَّةٍ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ ذِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ مَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٢٠

81:21.text: مُّطَا<rule class=ikhafa>عٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>َ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٢١

81:22.text: وَمَا صَاحِبُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٍ ٢٢

81:23.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> رَءَاهُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُفُقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٢٣

81:24.text: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ بِضَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٢٤

81:25.text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّج<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٢٥

81:27.text: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٧

81:28.text: لِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مَ ٢٨

81:29.text: وَمَا تَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُونَ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رَبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٩

82:5.text: عَلِمَتۡ نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا قَدَّمَتۡ وَأَخَّرَتۡ ٥

82:6.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٦

82:8.text: ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَىِّ صُورَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ رَكَّبَكَ ٨

82:9.text: كَلَّا بَلۡ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٩

82:10.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَلَيۡكُمۡ لَحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠

82:13.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَارَ لَفِى نَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٣

82:14.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُجَّارَ لَفِى جَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٤

82:17.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ مَا يَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ١٧

82:18.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ مَا يَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ١٨

82:19.text: يَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>سٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّنَفۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرُ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّهِ ١٩

83:2.text: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>كۡتَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ يَسۡتَوۡف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢

83:3.text: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمۡ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمۡ يُخۡسِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

83:4.text: أَلَا يَظُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عُوث<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤

83:6.text: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ لِرَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦

83:7.text: كَلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُجَّارِ لَفِى سِجّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٧

83:8.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ مَا سِجّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٨

83:11.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ١١

83:12.text: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَث<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٢

83:13.text: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُنَا قَالَ أَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِيرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣

83:14.text: كَلَّا‌ۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكۡسِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

83:15.text: كَلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ ع<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمَحۡجُوب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥

83:16.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَصَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ١٦

83:17.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُقَالُ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> تُكَذِّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧

83:18.text: كَلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَارِ لَفِى عِلِّيّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨

83:19.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ مَا عِلِّيّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

83:22.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَارَ لَفِى نَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٢٢

83:24.text: تَعۡرِفُ فِى وُجُوهِهِمۡ نَضۡرَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٢٤

83:25.text: يُسۡقَوۡنَ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّخۡت<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مٍ ٢٥

83:26.text: خِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِسۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َفِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فَلۡيَتَنَافَسِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِس<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٦

83:27.text: وَمِزَاجُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َسۡن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٢٧

83:28.text: عَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشۡرَبُ بِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُقَرَّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٨

83:29.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَضۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٩

83:30.text: وَإِذَا مَرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِهِمۡ يَتَغَامَز<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٠

83:31.text: وَإِذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلَب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَهۡلِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَكِه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣١

83:32.text: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ لَض<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓلّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٢

83:33.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُرۡسِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٣

83:34.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٤

83:36.text: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٦

84:6.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>هِ ٦

84:7.text: فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا مَنۡ أُوتِىَ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِيَمِينِهِۦ ٧

84:9.text: وَيَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلِبُ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَهۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَسۡرُورًا ٩

84:10.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا مَنۡ أُوتِىَ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ ١٠

84:13.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَهۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَسۡرُورًا ١٣

84:14.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رَ ١٤

84:15.text: بَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> بَصِيرًا ١٥

84:16.text: فَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سِمُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّفَ<rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ِ ١٦

84:19.text: لَتَرۡكَبُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ طَبَقًا عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َبَ<rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ٍ ١٩

84:21.text: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُ<rule class=madda_permissible>و</rule>نَ ۩ ٢١

84:22.text: بَلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُكَذِّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢

84:23.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يُوع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣

84:25.text: إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لَهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِۭ ٢٥

85:1.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ ذَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ج</rule>ِ ١

85:4.text: قُتِلَ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُخۡد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٤

85:5.text: ٱ<rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ ذَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٥

85:6.text: إِذۡ هُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا قُع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٦

85:7.text: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٧

85:8.text: وَمَا نَقَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُمۡ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٨

85:9.text: ٱلَّذِى لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُلۡكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٩

85:10.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ فَتَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَمۡ يَتُوبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ِ ١٠

85:11.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لَهُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَوۡزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ١١

85:12.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>شَ رَبِّكَ لَشَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ١٢

85:13.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هُوَ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِئُ وَيُع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ١٣

85:16.text: فَعَّا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَا يُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ١٦

85:17.text: هَلۡ أَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ حَدِيثُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجُن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ١٧

85:19.text: بَلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى تَكۡذ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ١٩

85:20.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ط</rule>ُۢ ٢٠

85:21.text: بَلۡ هُوَ قُرۡءَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّج<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٢١

86:1.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّارِ<rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ِ ١

86:2.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّارِ<rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ُ ٢

86:3.text: ٱ<rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ثَّاقِ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ُ ٣

86:4.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلُّ نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٌ ٤

86:5.text: فَلۡيَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ خُلِ<rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>َ ٥

86:6.text: خُلِقَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>َافِ<rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ٍ ٦

86:7.text: يَخۡرُجُ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّلۡبِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٧

86:8.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَىٰ رَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَقَادِرٌ ٨

86:10.text: فَمَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُوَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَاصِرٍ ١٠

86:11.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ ذَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عِ ١١

86:12.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ ذَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عِ ١٢

86:13.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَقَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َصۡلٌ ١٣

87:7.text: إِلَّا مَا ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَعۡلَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ ٧

87:9.text: فَذَكِّرۡ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفَعَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرَىٰ ٩

87:12.text: ٱلَّذِى يَصۡلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَىٰ ١٢

87:13.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ ١٣

87:14.text: قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَفۡلَحَ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َزَكَّىٰ ١٤

87:16.text: بَلۡ تُؤۡثِرُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا ١٦

87:17.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةُ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>قَىٰٓ ١٧

87:18.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا لَفِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّحُفِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُولَىٰ ١٨

88:1.text: هَلۡ أَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ حَدِيثُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شِيَةِ ١

88:6.text: لَّيۡسَ لَهُمۡ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>عٍ ٦

88:7.text: لَّا يُسۡمِنُ وَلَا يُغۡنِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>عٍ ٧

88:17.text: أَفَلَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُونَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ ١٧

88:21.text: فَذَكِّرۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مُذَكِّرٌ ٢١

88:26.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَلَيۡنَا حِسَابَهُم ٢٦

89:5.text: هَلۡ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ قَسَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّذِى حِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رٍ ٥

89:6.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِع<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٦

89:8.text: ٱلَّتِى لَمۡ يُخۡلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule> مِثۡلُهَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبِلَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٨

89:9.text: وَثَمُودَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ جَابُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّخۡرَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡو<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٩

89:11.text: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبِلَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ١١

89:12.text: فَأَكۡثَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَس<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>َ ١٢

89:13.text: فَصَبَّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّكَ سَوۡطَ عَذ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ١٣

89:14.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ لَبِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِرۡص<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ١٤

89:15.text: فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ إِذَا مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ رَبُّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَأَكۡرَمَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَنَعَّمَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَيَقُولُ رَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَكۡرَمَنِ ١٥

89:16.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِذَا مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيۡهِ رِزۡقَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَيَقُولُ رَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَنِ ١٦

89:17.text: كَلَّا‌ۖ بَل لَّا تُكۡرِمُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَت<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مَ ١٧

89:18.text: وَلَا تَحَ<rule class=madda_necessary>ـٰٓ</rule>ضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِسۡك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ١٨

89:19.text: وَتَأۡكُلُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تُّرَاثَ أَكۡل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ًا ١٩

89:20.text: وَتُحِبُّونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَالَ حُب<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ًا ٢٠

89:21.text: كَلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِذَا دُكَّتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ دَك<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>َكًّا ٢١

89:22.text: وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ رَبُّكَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَكُ صَف<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َفًّا ٢٢

89:23.text: وَجِ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ىٓ</rule>ءَ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=iqlab>ذِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِجَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ‌ۚ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَذَكَّرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرَىٰ ٢٣

89:25.text: فَيَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَحَ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٢٥

89:26.text: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَحَ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٢٦

89:27.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيَّتُهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َفۡسُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةُ ٢٧

89:28.text: ٱرۡجِع<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّرۡضِيَّةً ٢٨

89:29.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلِى فِى عِبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِى ٢٩

90:1.text: ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سِمُ بِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ١

90:2.text: وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ حِل<rule class=iqlab>ُّۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٢

90:4.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ فِى كَبَ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٤

90:5.text: أَيَحۡسَبُ أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِرَ عَلَيۡهِ أَحَ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٥

90:7.text: أَيَحۡسَبُ أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَرَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَحَ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٧

90:8.text: أَلَمۡ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_permissible>يۡ</rule>نِ ٨

90:10.text: وَهَدَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>دَ<rule class=madda_permissible>يۡ</rule>نِ ١٠

90:12.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَقَبَةُ ١٢

90:14.text: أَوۡ إِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى يَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِى مَسۡغَبَةٍ ١٤

90:17.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ كَانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتَوَاصَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رِ وَتَوَاصَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَرۡحَمَةِ ١٧

90:19.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَشۡــَٔمَةِ ١٩

91:3.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا ٣

91:5.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَمَا بَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا ٥

91:9.text: قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَفۡلَحَ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ز</rule>َكَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا ٩

91:10.text: وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَابَ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>َسَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا ١٠

91:13.text: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ نَاقَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَسُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا ١٣

91:14.text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِذَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِهِمۡ فَسَوَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هَا ١٤

92:2.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ ٢

92:3.text: وَمَا خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذَّكَرَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُ<rule class=ikhafa>نث</rule>َىٰٓ ٣

92:5.text: فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا مَنۡ أَعۡطَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَىٰ ٥

92:8.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا م<rule class=iqlab>َنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َخِلَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡنَىٰ ٨

92:11.text: وَمَا يُغۡنِى عَنۡهُ مَالُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ ١١

92:13.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَنَا لَلۡأَخِرَةَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُولَىٰ ١٣

92:19.text: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ِّعۡمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَىٰٓ ١٩

92:20.text: إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هِ رَبِّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡلَىٰ ٢٠

93:4.text: وَلَلۡأَخِرَةُ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُولَىٰ ٤

93:6.text: أَلَمۡ يَجِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>كَ يَتِي<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َـَٔـاوَىٰ ٦

93:9.text: فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>هَرۡ ٩

93:10.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِلَ فَلَا تَنۡهَرۡ ١٠

94:7.text: فَإِذَا فَرَغۡتَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> ٧

95:1.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تِّينِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّيۡت<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ١

95:4.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَحۡسَنِ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>و<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٤

95:5.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ رَدَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ أَسۡفَلَ سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥

95:6.text: إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فَلَهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٍ ٦

95:7.text: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعۡدُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٧

95:8.text: أَلَيۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِأَحۡكَمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨

96:1.text: ٱ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَأۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡمِ رَبِّكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>َ ١

96:2.text: خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ مِنۡ عَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ٍ ٢

96:5.text: عَلَّمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ مَا لَمۡ يَعۡلَمۡ ٥

96:6.text: كَلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ لَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>غَىٰٓ ٦

96:8.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَىٰٓ ٨

96:11.text: أَرَءَيۡتَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰٓ ١١

96:12.text: أَوۡ أَمَرَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>وَىٰٓ ١٢

96:14.text: أَلَمۡ يَعۡل<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>َم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَرَىٰ ١٤

96:15.text: كَلَّا لَئ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َهِ لَنَسۡفَع<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاصِيَةِ ١٥

96:19.text: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعۡهُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡجُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَرِ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule> ۩ ١٩

97:1.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ فِى لَيۡلَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِ ١

97:2.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ مَا لَيۡلَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِ ٢

97:3.text: لَيۡلَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٍ ٣

97:4.text: تَنَزَّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ أَمۡرٍ ٤

97:5.text: سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مٌ هِىَ حَتَّىٰ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>لَعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِ ٥

98:1.text: لَمۡ يَكُنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ أَهۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِكِينَ مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَةُ ١

98:2.text: رَسُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَتۡلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> صُحُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّطَهَّرَةً ٢

98:4.text: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ إِلَّا م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَةُ ٤

98:5.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُمِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينَ حُنَف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ وَيُقِيمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَيُؤۡتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ‌ۚ وَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ دِينُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَيِّمَةِ ٥

98:6.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ أَهۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِكِينَ فِى نَارِ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمۡ شَرُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَرِيَّةِ ٦

98:7.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمۡ خَيۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَرِيَّةِ ٧

98:8.text: جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُهُمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّهِمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَبَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّضِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهُ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لِمَنۡ خَشِىَ رَبَّهُۥ ٨

99:3.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ مَا لَهَا ٣

99:6.text: يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َصۡدُرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ أَشۡتَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيُرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ ٦

99:7.text: فَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َرَهُۥ ٧

99:8.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َر<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َرَهُۥ ٨

100:1.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ ضَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حًا ١

100:6.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ لِرَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَكَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٦

100:7.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَىٰ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَشَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٧

100:8.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لِحُبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡرِ لَشَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٨

100:9.text: ۞أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ٩

100:10.text: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ١٠

100:11.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّخَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُۢ ١١

101:3.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَارِعَةُ ٣

101:4.text: يَوۡمَ يَكُونُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَرَاشِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ث<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>ثِ ٤

101:5.text: وَتَكُونُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالُ كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِهۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>شِ ٥

101:6.text: فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>َقُلَتۡ مَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>زِينُهُۥ ٦

101:8.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا مَنۡ خَفَّتۡ مَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>زِينُهُۥ ٨

101:10.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ مَا هِيَهۡ ١٠

102:4.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤

102:5.text: كَلَّا لَوۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ عِلۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٥

102:7.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَتَرَوُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا عَيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٧

102:8.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَتُسۡــَٔلُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ يَوۡمَئِذٍ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٨

103:2.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ لَفِى خُسۡرٍ ٢

103:3.text: إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَتَوَاصَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رِ ٣

104:1.text: وَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّكُلِّ هُمَزَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ُّمَزَةٍ ١

104:3.text: يَحۡسَبُ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مَالَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَخۡلَدَهُۥ ٣

104:4.text: كَلَّا‌ۖ لَيُ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>َذَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُطَمَةِ ٤

104:5.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُطَمَةُ ٥

105:1.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡف<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لِ ١

105:2.text: أَلَمۡ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡ كَيۡدَهُمۡ فِى تَضۡل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لٍ ٢

105:4.text: تَرۡمِيه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِحِجَارَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ِجّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لٍ ٤

106:2.text: إ<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِهِمۡ رِحۡلَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شِّت<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صّ<rule class=madda_permissible>َي</rule>ۡفِ ٢

106:3.text: فَلۡيَعۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡب<rule class=madda_permissible>َي</rule>ۡتِ ٣

106:4.text: ٱلَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>عَمَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>ُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َءَامَنَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ خ<rule class=madda_permissible>َو</rule>ۡفِۭ ٤

107:1.text: أَرَءَيۡتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُكَذِّبُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ١

107:2.text: فَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يَدُعُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَت<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مَ ٢

107:3.text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِسۡك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٣

107:5.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َلَاتِهِمۡ سَاه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥

108:3.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَرُ ٣

109:3.text: وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِدُونَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡبُ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ٣

109:4.text: وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ عَابِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا عَبَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّمۡ ٤

109:5.text: وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِدُونَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡبُ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ٥

110:1.text: إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ نَصۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَتۡحُ ١

110:2.text: وَرَأَيۡتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُونَ فِى دِينِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَفۡوَاجًا ٢

110:3.text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرۡهُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا ٣

111:1.text: تَبَّتۡ يَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَبِى لَهَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>َّ ١

111:2.text: م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَمَا كَسَ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>َ ٢

111:3.text: سَيَصۡلَىٰ نَا<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َاتَ لَهَ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٣

111:4.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> حَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َالَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَطَ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٤

111:5.text: فِى جِيدِهَا حَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّسَ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِۭ ٥

112:3.text: لَمۡ يَلِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> وَلَمۡ يُولَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ٣

112:4.text: وَلَمۡ يَك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كُفُوًا أَحَ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُۢ ٤

113:2.text: مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َرِّ مَا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>َ ٢

113:3.text: وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>َ ٣

113:4.text: وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َرِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َفَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُقَ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٤

113:5.text: وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>َ ٥

114:1.text: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>سِ ١

114:3.text: إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>سِ ٣

114:4.text: مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َرِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَسۡوَاسِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>سِ ٤

114:5.text: ٱلَّذِى يُوَسۡوِسُ فِى صُدُورِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>سِ ٥

114:6.text: مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>سِ ٦
